title: 2BR house Available Sep1
posting_body: Nice 2BR at quiet st near town-center (Bedford, MA)
Two bedroom in duplex house is available from 09/01/2022.
Located at a quiet residential area in Bedford, MA, convenient for shopping (town center & Burlington Mall), minutes from routes I95, and very near to Minuteman Bike Trails.
$2150.00 monthly lease for 1 year or more.
Updated kitchen with gas stove & oven, electric dishwasher, microwave and refrigerator.
Updated hard wood floor with gas heating system.
Has a full basement (same size as the above level) with washer & dryer, and ample storage space.
First, Last and Security deposit required.
If interested, please provide us your information by answering to the following questions (before showing you the property):
Introduce yourself (your occupation, current employer & how long you've been working there).
How many people, and who will live with you in the property?
How is your credit and rent history, and can you provide us your rental references and pay-stub during processing your application?
